About Us

Our Story Unbending, Yet Agile.

Some words about the company

We are a global biopharmaceutical company changing patients’ lives in over 120 countries by finding new and affordable ways to treat diabetes and other illnesses.

Worldwide, more than half a billion people have diabetes.

In the U.S., it’s more than 37 million — and 9 out of 10 have type 2 diabetes, a complex disease where the body doesn’t use energy from food properly.

Despite the many treatment advancements in recent years, only half of the people living with diabetes are meeting goals for lowering their blood glucose levels.

When glucose is not properly managed, it may lead to serious complications, including kidney disease, nerve damage, heart attack and stroke.

Our Mission

The elements that form our company.

01

Easier Administration.

Our innovative solution makes taking medication a breeze, ensuring a hassle-free experience for users.

02

Reduced Side Effects.

Experience the benefits of Metformin with fewer associated side effects, enhancing overall well-being.

03

Enhanced Efficiency.

Our delivery mechanism optimizes the effectiveness of Metformin, providing superior results compared to traditional options.
